item.title: About me
item.description: What do I like about being a BA? Is the chance to apply analytical and problem-solving skills towards problems/opportunities within a company; is being the bridge between business and IT (in software development projects) and even between different business units! Is ensuring the right solution is found and delivered. What don't I like about being a BA? Is the perception that most people still have that a BA is a note taker, a simple creator of documentation that is only required by the process, but never really used by anyone else.
